# TVUserActivityTypeBrowsingChannelGuide

**Global Variable**

An activity for viewing your app’s channel guide.

## Declaration

```swift
let TVUserActivityTypeBrowsingChannelGuide: String
```

## Discussion

Support this [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserActivity] activity type in your app to display a channel guide or content browser when the user presses the Guide button on a remote. For more details on implementing a channel guide, see [doc://com.apple.tvservices/documentation/TVServices/providing-channel-navigation].

## Channel guide

- **Providing Channel Navigation**: Support browsing an electronic program guide (EPG) and changing channels with specialized remote buttons.
